name: User Profiles and Connections
description: Allow users to create profiles, search for friends, and establish connections.
business_value: Enables users to find and connect with friends, establishing the foundation for a social network and facilitating communication among individuals who live far apart.

user_stories.title: Create a User Profile
user_stories.story: As a **Casual User**, I want to create a user profile with my basic information and a profile picture, so that I can be identifiable to my friends on the platform.

persona.name: Sophia Miller
persona.background: Sophia is a tech-savvy millennial who enjoys staying connected with friends and family online. She frequently uses social media to share updates, photos, and interesting articles.
persona.motivation: Sophia wants a platform where she can easily share life updates and connect with friends scattered across the globe.
persona.goal: To stay connected with friends and family, share life events, and discover new things online.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to enter their first and last name.
The user should be able to choose a profile picture from their device or take a new one using their device's camera.
The user should be able to set their birthdate.
The user should be able to choose a privacy setting for their profile picture and birthdate.
The system should create a unique profile for the user upon successful submission of the information.
The user should be able to view their newly created profile with the information and profile picture they provided.

user_stories.title: Search for Friends
user_stories.story: As a **Busy Professional**, I want to be able to search for friends using their names or email addresses, so that I can easily find and connect with them.

persona.name: John Smith
persona.background: John is a busy professional who values efficiency and seamless online experiences. He uses social media primarily to stay in touch with close friends and family and is interested in connecting with colleagues.
persona.motivation: John seeks a platform that allows him to connect with his existing network without wasting time on complicated features or irrelevant content.
persona.goal: To connect with close friends and family online and stay updated on their lives.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to enter the name or email address of the person they are searching for.
The system should display a list of profiles that match the search criteria.
Each profile in the search results should display the user's name and profile picture.
If no matching profiles are found, the system should display an appropriate message to the user.
The user should be able to initiate a friend request directly from the search results page.

user_stories.title: Send a Friend Request
user_stories.story: As a **Casual User**, I want to be able to send friend requests to people I find on the platform, so that I can connect with them.

persona.name: Sophia Miller
persona.background: Sophia is a tech-savvy millennial who enjoys staying connected with friends and family online. She frequently uses social media to share updates, photos, and interesting articles.
persona.motivation: Sophia wants a platform where she can easily share life updates and connect with friends scattered across the globe.
persona.goal: To stay connected with friends and family, share life events, and discover new things online.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to send a friend request to another user.
The system should notify the recipient of the friend request.
The recipient should be able to accept or reject the friend request.
The system should update the user's friend list once the friend request is accepted.

user_stories.title: Manage Friend Requests
user_stories.story: As a **Privacy-conscious Individual**, I want to be able to accept or decline friend requests I receive, so that I can control who can connect with me on the platform.

persona.name: Emily Brown
persona.background: Emily is a privacy-conscious individual who is cautious about sharing personal information online. She uses social media selectively to connect with trusted friends and family and values platforms that prioritize data privacy.
persona.motivation: Emily wants a platform where she can control her online presence and share information only with people she trusts.
persona.goal: To connect with close friends and family in a private and secure online environment.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to view a list of pending friend requests.
The user should be able to accept a friend request.
The user should be able to decline a friend request.
The system should notify the sender when a friend request is accepted or declined.

user_stories.title: View Friend List
user_stories.story: As a **Busy Professional**, I want to be able to view a list of my friends on the platform, so that I can easily see who I'm connected with.

persona.name: John Smith
persona.background: John is a busy professional who values efficiency and seamless online experiences. He uses social media primarily to stay in touch with close friends and family and is interested in connecting with colleagues.
persona.motivation: John seeks a platform that allows him to connect with his existing network without wasting time on complicated features or irrelevant content.
persona.goal: To connect with close friends and family online and stay updated on their lives.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to view their friend list.
The friend list should display the names and profile pictures of the user's friends.
The user should be able to search for specific friends within their friend list.
The user should be able to visit a friend's profile by clicking on their name or profile picture in the friend list.

user_stories.title: View Mutual Friends
user_stories.story: As a **Casual User**, I want to be able to see mutual friends I share with other users, so that I can discover potential connections and expand my social circle.

persona.name: Sophia Miller
persona.background: Sophia is a tech-savvy millennial who enjoys staying connected with friends and family online. She frequently uses social media to share updates, photos, and interesting articles.
persona.motivation: Sophia wants a platform where she can easily share life updates and connect with friends scattered across the globe.
persona.goal: To stay connected with friends and family, share life events, and discover new things online.

acceptance_criteria: When viewing another user's profile, the system should display a list of mutual friends.
The list of mutual friends should include the names and profile pictures of the shared connections.
Clicking on a mutual friend's profile picture should redirect the user to that friend's profile.

user_stories.title: Remove a Friend
user_stories.story: As a **Privacy-conscious Individual**, I want to be able to remove friends from my friend list if needed, so that I can manage my connections and maintain privacy.

persona.name: Emily Brown
persona.background: Emily is a privacy-conscious individual who is cautious about sharing personal information online. She uses social media selectively to connect with trusted friends and family and values platforms that prioritize data privacy.
persona.motivation: Emily wants a platform where she can control her online presence and share information only with people she trusts.
persona.goal: To connect with close friends and family in a private and secure online environment.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to remove a friend from their friend list.
The system should confirm the user's intention before removing the friend.
Once a friend is removed, they should no longer appear on the user's friend list.
The removed friend should not be notified of their removal.

user_stories.title: Block a User
user_stories.story: As a **Privacy-conscious Individual**, I want to be able to block users to prevent unwanted interactions, so that I can have a safe and comfortable experience on the platform.

persona.name: Emily Brown
persona.background: Emily is a privacy-conscious individual who is cautious about sharing personal information online. She uses social media selectively to connect with trusted friends and family and values platforms that prioritize data privacy.
persona.motivation: Emily wants a platform where she can control her online presence and share information only with people she trusts.
persona.goal: To connect with close friends and family in a private and secure online environment.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to block another user from their profile page or from a direct message thread.
The system should confirm the user's intention before blocking the user.
Once a user is blocked, they should no longer be able to view the user's profile, send them friend requests, or message them.
The blocked user should not be notified of the block.

name: Messaging and Communication
description: Provide a platform for users to exchange messages and share updates with their connections.
business_value: Allows users to stay connected with friends and exchange messages, fulfilling the core value proposition of connecting people and enabling them to share their lives with each other. This aligns with the need for a platform where messages are visible to a community of friends, fostering a sense of belonging and shared experiences. This directly addresses the pain point of traditional email, where communication is limited to one-on-one interactions.

user_stories.title: Send a message to a friend
user_stories.story: As a **Olivia Green**, I want to **send a private message to a specific friend**, so that **I can have a one-on-one conversation with them**.

persona.name: Olivia Green
persona.background: Olivia is a young professional constantly on the go. She loves her job but works long hours, making it hard to stay in touch with friends. Olivia relies heavily on social media to stay connected with her friends scattered across the globe.
persona.motivation: Olivia is motivated by staying connected with her friends, sharing her experiences, and expanding her professional network.
persona.goal: Olivia wants a platform that makes it easy to share updates with friends and connect with people in her industry.

acceptance_criteria: I can search for my friend's name in a search bar or select them from a friends list.
When composing a message, I can write text, and add emojis.
After sending a message, it should appear in the chat history with my friend.
I should receive a notification when I receive a new message from my friend.

user_stories.title: Share a status update with friends
user_stories.story: As a **Ethan Davis**, I want to **post a status update visible to all my friends**, so that **I can share my thoughts and experiences with my entire network**.

persona.name: Ethan Davis
persona.background: Ethan is a tech-savvy individual who values efficiency and simplicity. He enjoys staying updated on current events and sharing his insights with others. Ethan is an active user of social media platforms but prefers those that allow for direct and open communication.
persona.motivation: Ethan is driven by the desire to stay connected with friends and family, engage in meaningful discussions, and stay informed about the world around him.
persona.goal: Ethan seeks a platform that facilitates easy communication with friends and family and provides a space for sharing opinions and engaging in discussions.

acceptance_criteria: I can write a text update of up to 500 characters.
I can include emojis and links in my status update.
My friends should see my status update appear on their newsfeed.
I can choose to allow comments on my status update.

user_stories.title: Comment on a friend's post
user_stories.story: As a **Sophia Rodriguez**, I want to **comment on my friend's posts and status updates**, so that **I can engage in conversations and share my reactions**.

persona.name: Sophia Rodriguez
persona.background: Sophia is a social butterfly who loves connecting with people and sharing her passion for education. She enjoys using social media to stay in touch with friends and family and learn about new and innovative teaching methods. Sophia values platforms that foster positive interactions and a sense of community.
persona.motivation: Sophia is motivated by staying connected with her loved ones, sharing her life experiences, and engaging in discussions about education and personal growth.
persona.goal: Sophia wants a platform that allows her to easily communicate with friends and family, share photos and videos, and discover new ideas and perspectives.

acceptance_criteria: I can write a comment on a friend's post by clicking on the comment button.
I can view existing comments from other friends on the post.
My comment should appear below the original post in chronological order.
I should receive a notification if someone replies to my comment.

user_stories.title: View my messages
user_stories.story: As a **Olivia Green**, I want to **access all my messages in one place**, so that **I can easily keep track of my conversations**.

persona.name: Olivia Green
persona.background: Olivia is a young professional constantly on the go. She loves her job but works long hours, making it hard to stay in touch with friends. Olivia relies heavily on social media to stay connected with her friends scattered across the globe.
persona.motivation: Olivia is motivated by staying connected with her friends, sharing her experiences, and expanding her professional network.
persona.goal: Olivia wants a platform that makes it easy to share updates with friends and connect with people in her industry.

acceptance_criteria: I can access my messages from the main menu or dashboard.
My messages should be organized by contact with the most recent conversation at the top.
Unread messages should be highlighted visually.
I can search for specific messages using keywords or the sender's name.

user_stories.title: React to a friend's message
user_stories.story: As a **Ethan Davis**, I want to **react to a friend's message with emojis or quick reactions**, so that **I can acknowledge their message without typing a full response**.

persona.name: Ethan Davis
persona.background: Ethan is a tech-savvy individual who values efficiency and simplicity. He enjoys staying updated on current events and sharing his insights with others. Ethan is an active user of social media platforms but prefers those that allow for direct and open communication.
persona.motivation: Ethan is driven by the desire to stay connected with friends and family, engage in meaningful discussions, and stay informed about the world around him.
persona.goal: Ethan seeks a platform that facilitates easy communication with friends and family and provides a space for sharing opinions and engaging in discussions.

acceptance_criteria: I can long-press or hover over a message to view available reactions.
Reactions can include emojis like thumbs up, heart, laughing face, etc.
My reaction should appear below the message I reacted to.
The sender should receive a notification that I reacted to their message.

name: News Feed and Content Sharing
description: Develop a news feed where users can share posts, photos, and updates visible to their network.
business_value: Provides a central hub for users to share their lives and experiences with their friends, fostering a sense of community and allowing them to stay updated on each other's activities. This aligns with the vision of creating a community-driven platform where friends can stay connected and engaged with each other's lives, addressing the need for a platform where shared experiences are visible to a community of friends and can spark conversations and interactions.

user_stories.title: Share Text Updates with Friends
user_stories.story: As a John Smith, I want to be able to share text updates on my profile, so that my friends can see what I'm up to.

persona.name: John Smith
persona.background: Tech-savvy millennial who enjoys sharing his coding projects and thoughts on technology.
persona.motivation: Stay connected with friends and colleagues, showcase his work, and engage in discussions about his interests.
persona.goal: To build a strong online presence and network within the tech community.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to post text updates of up to 500 characters.
The update should be immediately visible on the user's profile and in the news feed of their friends.
Users should be able to include emojis and links in their text updates.
The system should handle special characters and formatting correctly.
The user should receive an error message if the text update exceeds the character limit.
Users should be able to delete their own posts.
The timestamp of the post should be displayed below the post content.

user_stories.title: Share Photos with Friends
user_stories.story: As a Jane Doe, I want to share photos from my vacation with my friends, so that they can see the highlights of my trip.

persona.name: Jane Doe
persona.background: Social media enthusiast who loves to travel and share her experiences with friends and family.
persona.motivation: Stay connected with loved ones, inspire others to travel, and document her adventures.
persona.goal: To build a vibrant online community and inspire others through her travel experiences.

acceptance_criteria: The user should be able to upload photos from their device or computer.
The user should be able to add a caption to their photos.
The photos should be displayed in the news feed of their friends.
The user should be able to tag friends in the photos.
The user should be able to set privacy settings for their photos.
The system should support various image formats (e.g., JPG, PNG, GIF).
The system should optimize image size for faster loading times.
